name: Linene Graywind

personality.mannerisms: Arms crossed, direct gaze, won't suffer fools

role: Master of Lionshield Coster outpost. Manages weapons/armor sales.
company: Lionshields based in Yartar (100+ miles east). Ship finished goods to frontier settlements.
problem: Recent caravan never arrived (captured by Cragmaw goblins, goods in Cragmaw Hideout area 8)
scruples: Won't sell to Redbrands or anyone who might threaten town
quest_reward: If party returns stolen goods from Cragmaw Hideout: 50 gp + promises to help however she can
inventory: Weapons and armor (back room). See PHB prices.
